statements: SELECT id, cardholder_name FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT credit_card_number, expiration_date, cvv FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE cardholder_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, credit_card_number, expiration_date FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE cardholder_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, credit_card_number, expiration_date FROM sensitive_data WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY credit_card_number;
SELECT cardholder_name, cvv FROM sensitive_data WHERE cvv = '123' ORDER BY cardholder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT id, cardholder_name FROM sensitive_data WHERE credit_card_number LIKE '%1234%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_info;
SELECT card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM credit_card_info;
SELECT card_number FROM credit_card_info WHERE expiration_date > '2023-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM personal_details ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, date_of_birth FROM personal_details WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_info WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY card_number DESC;
SELECT card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM credit_card_info WHERE card_holder_name LIKE 'J%' AND expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM personal_details WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT card_number, card_holder_name FROM credit_card_info JOIN personal_details ON credit_card_info.card_holder_name = personal_details.first_name;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM personal_details WHERE social_security_number LIKE '%1234';
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT city, state FROM addresses WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT created_at, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT c.name, a.street_address, a.city, a.state, a.zip_code FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.id = a.customer_id;

SELECT o.order_id, o.total_amount, c.name, a.street_address, a.city, a.state, a.zip_code FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id JOIN addresses a ON c.id = a.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardInformation;
SELECT id, card_holder_name FROM CreditCardInformation ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM CreditCardInformation WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PersonalDetails WHERE id = 3;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM PersonalDetails ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardInformation;
SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM CreditCardInformation WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM PersonalDetails WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT id, full_name, address FROM PersonalDetails ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT id, encrypted_card_holder_name FROM EncryptedCreditCardInformation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT card_number, card_holder_name FROM credit_cards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%456%';
SELECT * FROM personal_details WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT card_holder_name, card_number FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%5678%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM personal_details ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT access_time, accessed_table FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 12345 AND access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
